sourcesContent:
import "./HotelCard.css" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useWishlist } from "../../context/wishlist-context" export const HotelCard = ({hotel})=>{ const {_id,name,image,address,state,rating,price} = hotel const navigate = useNavigate() const {wishlistDispatch,wishlist} = useWishlist() const handleHotelCardClick = ()=>{ navigate(`/hotels/${name}/${address}-${state}/${_id}/reserve`) } const handleWishlistClick = ()=>{ wishlistDispatch({ type:"ADD_TO_WISHLIST", payload :hotel }) } console.log({wishlist}) return(
{address}, {state} star {rating}

{name}

Rs. {price} night

) }
